function RIR_EP05_18()
    -- .結-3【3月第1週】「姫選挙-姫皇ｖｓ姫ギャル-」
    SaveData.Title = "姫選挙-姫皇ｖｓ姫ギャル-"

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024dc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM15.wav")

    MSG([[ And so the final Princess Election arrived. ]])

    MSG([[ The battle for the throne of Princess between Hermes and Lira had begun. ]])

    -- //CG：ステージ上のリラ（対決・エルメス）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVb001ac")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,570,-160)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    MSG([[ As expected, Hermes's appeal was a live performance. It was incredibly exciting, and the atmosphere in the venue quickly turned in favor of Hermes. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ However, the moment Lira's appeal started, the atmosphere in the venue changed. ]])

    -- //CG：ステージ上のリラ（素顔リラ・驚くエルメス）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV031aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Lira appeared on the stage—her makeup removed, revealing a plain face with a mismatched gal fashion look. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1318.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Look closely. This is my true face—Charismatic JK Lira Hoozuki." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1319.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "From now on, I’ll show you right in front of your eyes how much this weed-like face can become beautiful with makeup." ]])

    MSG([[ In front of the stunned students, Lira began applying makeup. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"EV031ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ She started a clear transformation into her usual gal-like appearance. ]])

    -- //SE：どよめき
    --PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav",0,true)

    -- //SE：歓声（中）
    --PLAY_SE("SEf002.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"EV031ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ The reactions to her transformation varied widely. Some wore bitter expressions, some were confused, and others were enthusiastic. ]])

    MSG([[ It was a spectacle of mixed murmurs and cheers, unlike any previous Princess Election. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"EV031ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ There was no doubt that everyone there was surprised by Lira’s makeup skills. ]])

	STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"EV031ae")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1320.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Done! How about it compared to the first face? Looks a bit better, right?" ]])

    MSG([[ Lira’s usual makeup was complete. The venue echoed with scattered applause. ]])

    MSG([[ Maybe everyone was more surprised by the fact that Lira’s true face was rather plain than impressed by the makeup. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1677.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "You’re cute, Lira!" ]])

    MSG([[ I called out loudly. Lira on stage widened her eyes and spoke. ]])

	STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",1000)

	LAYER_LOAD(10,"EV031be")
	LAYER_POSITION(10,-760,-218)
	LAYER_SCALE(10,90,90)
	LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(10,-370,-218,30000,Ease.OutSine)
	SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1321.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Some people think it’s cheating to get cute with makeup, right? But, hey, if you’re not born with a good face, does that mean you can’t try to be cute?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1322.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Is effort not allowed? Should we know our place from the start? Are weeds not allowed to try to bloom flowers?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1323.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I will never accept that! There are plenty of examples where ugly weeds bloom beautiful flowers!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1324.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I, and everyone here, even boys! We have the right to become cute!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1325.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Even those of you watching me now… you can be cute. You can even be the star!" ]])

	LAYER_LOAD(10,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1326.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Listen up! If I become the 'Princess', it won’t just be about admiring the 'Princess'! I intend to change this academy so anyone can aim to be a 'Princess'!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1327.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Because I stood by Erika as a 'Knight', I can say this with confidence." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1328.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Simply admiring is not enough to become cute. First, you have to believe you can become cute." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Lira once again exposed her makeup-free face to the audience, speaking with all her heart. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV031aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)


PLAY_VOICE("lira_1329.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "If you can't believe in yourself, believe in me. I just transformed right here in front of you, so you can trust me more than anything, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1330.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I will always… remain your goal." ]])

SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    -- //SE：拍手（小）
    PLAY_SE("SEa020.wav",0,true)
    WAIT(500)

    -- //SE：拍手（中）
    PLAY_SE("SEa021.wav",1000,true)
    WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ The scattered applause gradually grew— ]])

    -- //SE：拍手（MAX）
    PLAY_SE("SEa019.wav",0,true)

    MSG([[ until it turned into a grand applause encompassing the entire auditorium. ]])

    MSG([[ Lira’s words stirred a commotion throughout the venue, creating an atmosphere unlike any previous election. ]])

    MSG([[ It was proof that Lira’s completely new, realistic image of a 'Princess' had captured the hearts of the students. ]])


STOP_SE("SEa020.wav",1000)
STOP_SE("SEa021.wav",1000)
STOP_SE("SEa019.wav",1000)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1331.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I was a weed, but thanks to this academy, I was able to bloom. Those of you watching now can also bloom beautiful, big flowers." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1332.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Now, bloom proudly, you weeds. Until you can believe in yourselves, I will proudly continue blooming at the top of this academy for you." ]])

    STOP_BGM(2000)

    MSG([[ As the entire auditorium showered Lira with unreserved applause, some people approached me watching from the edge of the venue. ]])

    -- //BG：大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
    -- //BU：ネメシア（通常）、アルメリア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ARU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM01.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0157.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "A realistic beautiful girl over a perfect one, huh? It seems I misread the changes of the times." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0158.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "But you know, the times will change again. The fuss over 'beautiful girls' always lasts only a little while." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1678.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I’m sure that’s true. But look at Lira’s expression." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //CI：リラ横切り抜き（笑顔） 138
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG024dc")
    LAYER_SCALE(200,200,200)
    LAYER_EFFECT(200,7)
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BU_RIR08ia")
    LAYER_SCALE(201, 150, 150)
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,-65)
    SET_CUTIN_02_3L(100, 500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1679.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I’m certain Lira can keep smiling. That’s what I believe." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    RESET_CUTIN_02_LEFT(100, 500)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ra")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0159.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "I wish for that too…" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0160.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】
 "Support her. Make sure that small, fragile, nameless flower doesn’t snap." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ARU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0045.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "...Bye bye, Mina-chan. I’ll try a little harder too." ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,600,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    MSG([[ With just that warning, Nemesia took Hermes by the hand and disappeared outside the venue. ]])

    MSG([[ The last glimpse I caught of Nemesia’s profile looked somehow satisfied. ]])

    MSG([[ And finally, the voting results of the Princess Election were announced to the venue— ]])

    -- 　　　　　◆
    STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)
    
	LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
	SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",2000,false)

    -- //EDムービー
    EndMovie()

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP05_19")
end
